statements: SELECT * FROM referee_data
SELECT name, age FROM referee_data WHERE nationality='Spain'
SELECT * FROM referee_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT referee_id, name FROM referee_data WHERE experience_years > 5
SELECT name, nationality FROM referee_data WHERE age < 40
SELECT * FROM referee_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, nationality FROM referee_data WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT referee_id, age FROM referee_data WHERE nationality = 'England' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM referee_data WHERE experience_years < 3 AND nationality = 'France';
SELECT MAX(age), MIN(age), AVG(experience_years) FROM referee_data WHERE nationality IN ('Brazil', 'Germany');
SELECT * FROM referee_data;
SELECT referee_name, referee_age FROM referee_data;
SELECT referee_id, referee_experience FROM referee_data WHERE referee_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM match_rules;
SELECT rule_description, rule_category FROM match_rules WHERE rule_category = 'Football';
SELECT * FROM referee_data WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT referee_name, referee_age FROM referee_data ORDER BY referee_age DESC;
SELECT rule_description FROM match_rules WHERE rule_category = 'Foul' AND rule_id >= 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_referees FROM referee_data;
SELECT AVG(referee_experience) AS average_experience FROM referee_data;
SELECT * FROM referee_data;
SELECT referee_name, referee_age FROM referee_data;
SELECT DISTINCT referee_name FROM referee_data;
SELECT referee_name, referee_age FROM referee_data ORDER BY referee_name ASC;
SELECT r.referee_name, d.decision_description FROM referee_data r JOIN disciplinary_decisions d ON r.referee_id = d.referee_id;
SELECT referee_id, referee_name, referee_age FROM referee_data ORDER BY referee_name DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_description, referee_id FROM disciplinary_decisions WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT rule_id, rule_description FROM match_rules WHERE rule_category = 'Foul Play';
SELECT * FROM referee_data rd JOIN disciplinary_decisions dd ON rd.referee_id = dd.referee_id;
SELECT rd.referee_name, dd.decision_description FROM referee_data rd, disciplinary_decisions dd WHERE rd.referee_id = dd.referee_id AND dd.match_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Referees WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Referees WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT referee_id, name, nationality, years_of_experience FROM Referees WHERE nationality = 'England';
SELECT * FROM Matches WHERE venue = 'Stadium ABC' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT match_id, venue, referee_id FROM Matches ORDER BY match_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Referees WHERE nationality = 'England';
SELECT name, years_of_experience FROM Referees ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT Matches.match_id, Matches.venue, Referees.name FROM Matches JOIN Referees ON Matches.referee_id = Referees.referee_id WHERE Referees.years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT rule_description FROM MatchRules WHERE rule_description LIKE '%foul%';

SELECT Matches.match_date, Matches.venue, COUNT(DisciplinaryDecisions.decision_id) AS disciplinary_count FROM Matches LEFT JOIN DisciplinaryDecisions ON Matches.match_id = DisciplinaryDecisions.match_id GROUP BY Matches.match_id HAVING disciplinary_count > 0 ORDER BY Matches.match_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT id, name, age, country FROM referees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, country FROM referees WHERE country = 'Spain';
SELECT * FROM matches ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT match_id, date, time, location FROM matches WHERE location LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT * FROM referees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT match_id, date, location FROM matches WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM referees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_decisions WHERE rule_id = 2 AND match_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS decision_count FROM disciplinary_decisions GROUP BY match_id HAVING decision_count > 2;
